charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] was walking through
town when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] heard a cheerful voice.
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0200:
All riiight! Nice one, Crawdaunt! Your moves were
so on point, they had me mesmerized!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0400:
Hey, listen to this! Crawdaunt just BARELY won a
battle! It was so close I was sweating!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0500:
I mean...it was only because I was late giving
orders, but still!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0600:
I was just so entranced watching my opponent's
partner Pokémon—it was really good at dancing!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0700:
Whenever I see a Pokémon moving in such a cool
way, I can’t help but watch!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0800:
After all, it’s my dream to form a dance team with
Pokémon someday!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_0900:
Trevs is gonna get mad at me again if I don’t get
it together, though.
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_1000:
But whether we’re dancing or battling other
Pokémon, I can always count on Crawdaunt!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0401_1200:
Yeah, of course! All Pokémon can dance if they're
feeling happy!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0402_1400:
They were swaying and spinning—classic
Bellossom! And so cute too!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0402_1500:
It made a great contrast to Crawdaunt’s cool
dance moves. A perfect combination!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_1600:
You know how they say Crawdaunt’s a really hard
Pokémon to raise on account of its wild temper?
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_1700:
That’s exactly why I think it’s got the potential to
become a great dancer, if I can raise it so it likes
to dance for fun!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_1800:
Pokémon really do move in the most intriguing
ways! Crawdaunt’s no exception!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_1900:
Just thinking about how to use those movements in
a dance is so exciting!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_2000:
As for a stage where I could dance together with
Pokémon...
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_2100:
There are stages in other regions where you can
have fun with your Pokémon, aren’t there?
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0401_2300: Yeah! Where they have Super Contest Shows!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0401_2400:
It’s truly my dream stage—you can become a star
by dancing!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0402_2700:
It’d sure be a dream if our dance were made into
a movie!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_2800:
It’s not easy making dreams come true...but so
long as I've got my Pokémon with me, I’m sure it’ll
work out!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_2900:
My friends who traveled together with me in Kalos
are all chasing after their own dreams too...
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_3000: I’ve gotta do my best to stay on par with them!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_0302_3300: Let’s give it a try together!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_3500: You should join my dance team!
charaepi_ch0180_00_tierno/2301_1201_3600: I’m sure you and I could make the best team!
